thoughts.content:
# Five Dharmas

1. Name
    1. Everything is labeled with a name
    2. Fabricated from our mind
2. Appearance
    1. All phenomena are from the mind
    2. We derive attachments to these appearances 
3. Discrimination
    1. Conceptual mind
    2. Duality/classification 
4. Right Knowledge
    1. Truth of the worlds
    2. Noble wisdom
5. Suchness
    1. Reality 
    2. Samsara-less perception 
    3. The world is fabricated in our minds
